changToOldDir() - 类 中的方法com.Leo.Game.Hero
Hero movement method When the enemy hero hits the obstacle, it will return to the position of the previous step, thus solving the problem that the hero hits the obstacle and does not look back.

CommonWall - com.Leo.Game中的类
Common wall Ordinary walls have the following attributes: the fixed length (CommonWall.length) and width(CommonWall.width) of the wall, the position coordinates of the wall(CommonWall.x,CommonWall.y), and the wall is represented by the image added to the graphical user interface.
